p.k: crushing omen hurts you if your in dark places!
p.v: 如果你身处黑暗之地，粉碎预兆效果会伤害你！

p.k: distorted ender pearls can shield you from absolute dread. although you might not need that information now.
p.v: 扭曲的末影珍珠能让你免于绝对的恐惧。尽管你现在可能不需要这些信息。

p.k: voidcallers wont call for help if you kill them with arrows!
p.v: 如果你用箭射死虚空召唤者，他们就不会求救了！

p.k: I saw unfamiliar creatures wandering around the distortion I wonder if thats concerning.
p.v: 我看到一些陌生的生物在扭曲之地的周围游荡，不知道这是否与它们有关。

p.k: Scouts love berry treats as much as I do! you can even tame them with them.
p.v: 侦查者和我一样喜欢吃浆果零食！你甚至可以用它们来驯服它们。

p.k: origin matter is found at the bottom of the distortion similar to netherite!
p.v: 在扭曲之地的底部发现了与地狱石类似的起源物质！

p.k: Radi'ite catalysts are a great source of easy xp!
p.v: 辐射催化剂是轻松获得 xp 很好的来源！

p.k: IreStone ore can be found near the bottom of the overworld.
p.v: 怒火合金矿石可以在主世界地底附近找到。

p.v: §5§l第三章：仇恨之焰

p.v: (第三章还没有完成，设置这个触发器是为了防止玩家在第三章发布后需要重新与格莱卡利斯战斗才能进入第三章）。

p.k: §b§lChapter Two: Sorrowful Winter
p.v: §b§l第二章：悲哀之冬

p.k: §l§4The Slumbering Omen: Your time is limited.
p.v: §l§4沉睡的预兆：你的时间有限

p.k: Huh? You wanna go somewhere?
p.v: 嗯？你想去什么地方吗？

p.k: Alright ill stop.
p.v: 好的，我停下。

p.k: Mission? What?
p.v: 任务？什么任务？

p.k: Am I supposed to give you a quest or something?
p.v: 我是不是该给你一个任务什么的？

p.k: Uuuh.
Well, hmm. Bring me one block of origin matter I guess.
p.v: 嗯 给我拿一块起源物质吧。

p.k: (I wonder if they'll actually do this stupid quest.)
p.v: (不知道他们是否真的会完成这个愚蠢的任务）。

p.k: Oh- You, actually did it?
p.v: 你真的照做了？

p.k: Huh I wasnt actually expecting that.
p.v: 呵呵，我还真没想到。

p.k: Hey. I might actually have something for you to do.
p.v: 嘿，我可能真的有些活给你做。

p.k: Come talk to me again if your interested.
p.v: 如果你有兴趣，可以再来找我。

p.k: Hey.
p.v: 嘿。

p.k: Well you've come back so i guess you want that quest.
p.v: 你回来了，所以我猜你想要那个任务。

p.k: I've never told you but when I was still empowered I was in a little battle of my own. Just like you and tiso.
p.v: 我从来没有告诉过你，但当我还拥有力量的时候，我自己也在进行一场小小的战斗。就像你和提索一样

p.k: Deep beneath the bedrock of the distortion. Something has been trying crawl its way out from the depths.
p.v: 在扭曲之地的基岩深处。有什么东西一直试图从深处爬出来。

p.k: This creature is ancient. Its lived since the birth of the distortion it very well could be billions of years old
p.v: 这种生物非常古老。它从扭曲之地诞生之初就开始存在，很可能已经有数十亿年的历史了

p.k: My disciples and I have been keeping that thing down there for years. And without me, im afraid it might escape.
p.v: 我和我的教徒们已经把那东西关在下面好多年了。如果没有我，我怕它会跑掉。

p.k: Its a pretty tough ask. But if you've got the guts to go down there and defeat it, that could weaken it enough to keep it bound.
p.v: 这是一个相当艰难的要求。但如果你有胆量下去打败它，就能削弱它的力量，让它束手就擒。

p.k: Oh yeah. And dont try any of your friendship nonsense with this creature it was never human it does not feel, it only wishes to hunt any living thing it sees.
p.v: 对了 不要跟这种生物谈什么友谊，它从来就不是人类，它没有感情，它只想猎杀它看到的任何生物。

p.k: If you choose to do this. Take this to break through the bedrock twice at the bottom of the distortion. Also, good luck, your gonna need it.
p.v: 如果你选择这样做。用它来两次突破扭曲之地底部的基岩。另外，祝你好运，你会需要它的。

p.k: Oh and if you need another one of those It'll cost you another origin matter block hehehe
p.v: 哦，如果你还需要一个，那就得再花一个起源物质块了。

p.k: If your up to the task go down to bedrock and break it open. attempting to break it a second time should let you access the abyss.
p.v: 如果你能完成任务，就下到基岩处将其撸开。尝试再次撸掉它，就能进入深渊。

p.k: What.
p.v: 什么？

p.k: Wait you actually fended it off?
p.v: 等等，你真的把它击退了？

p.k: What do you mean you killed it?!
p.v: 你杀了它是什么意思？

p.k: Wow. you never cease to amaze me kid.
p.v: 哇，你真是让我大吃一惊，孩子。

p.k: To be honest I assumed that thing was immortal.
p.v: 老实说，我以为那东西是不死之身。

p.k: Well I gotta say kid, you got a lot going for you. I would say you've proved yourself.
p.v: 我得说，孩子，你有很多优点。我想说，你已经证明了自己。

p.k: From now on that thing shouldnt bother you in the abyss. so feel free to explore it to your hearts content.
p.v: 从现在开始，深渊中的那东西就不会再打扰你了，请尽情探索吧。

p.k: Oh yeah I suppose I should give you your reward.
p.v: 对了，我想我该给你奖励了。

p.k: I made this myself take good care of it
p.v: 这是我自己做的，要好好保管

p.k: Welp. other than that I dont have anything for you to do now. Stay safe out there bud.
p.v: 除此之外，我现在也没别的事让你做了。注意安全。

p.k: What the hell.
p.v: 什么鬼。

p.k: Alright I'll stay around here.
p.v: 好吧，我就待在这附近

p.k: Alright I'll move again
p.v: 好吧，我再移动起来

p.k: Distorted creatures are no longer invading the Overworld!
p.v: 扭曲生物不再入侵主世界！

p.k: Tiso would like to talk to you.
p.v: 提索想和你谈谈。

p.k: Objective complete! Return to glykaris.
p.v: 目标已完成！返回格莱卡利斯那。

p.k: §l§4What?
p.v: §l§4什么？

p.k: §l§4What is this?
p.v: §l§4这是什么？

p.k: §l§4Who are these people. they look so. familiar...
p.v: §l§4这些人是谁 他们看起来如此眼熟

p.k: §l§4How could I have forgotten.
p.v: §l§4我怎么会忘记呢。

p.k: §l§4My worst mistake.
p.v: §l§4这是我最大的错误

p.k: §l§4I lost control and pushed the people closest to me away...
p.v: §l§4我失去了控制，把最亲近的人推得远远的...

p.k: §l§4I never even got to apologize for how I acted.
p.v: §l§4我甚至没有机会为我的行为道歉。

p.k: §l§4Now all my siblings will remember of me is the grief I caused them.
p.v: §l§4现在，我的兄弟姐妹只记得我给他们带来的悲伤。

p.k: §l§4Our parents death took a toll on all of us. I shouldnt have been so selfish.
p.v: §l§4父母的去世对我们所有人都造成了伤害。我不该这么自私的。

p.k: §l§4I suppose in a way. I took it out on you too human.
p.v: §l§4我想在某种程度上，我把气都撒在你身上了。

p.k: §l§4I... apologize for that. and any trouble I caused you.
p.v: §l§4我......为此道歉，也为给你带来的麻烦道歉。

p.k: §l§4And thank you. For bringing me to my senses.
p.v: §l§4谢谢你，让我恢复了理智。

p.k: §l§4I know it isnt much. but please take this as a token of my gratitude.
p.v: §l§4我知道这不算什么，但请收下我的谢意。

p.k: Distorted Creatures Are Invading The Overworld!
p.v: 扭曲的生物正在入侵主世界！

p.k: §4§lThe Slumbering Omen: OH YOU WANNA FIGHT HUH?!
p.v: §4§l沉睡的预兆：你想打架吗？！

p.k: Where do you want to go?
p.v: 你想去哪里？

p.k: Ok I'll stop following you
p.v: 好的，我不再跟着你了

p.k: What? Why are you giving me this? I dont understand you human.
p.v: 什么？你为什么给我这个？我不明白你这个人类。

p.k: I dont want your pitty.
p.v: 我不需要你的同情。

p.k: Glykaris has retreated!
p.v: 格莱卡利斯撤退了！

p.k: Tiso would like to talk to you...
p.v: 提索想和你谈谈...

p.k: Tiso would like to talk to you.
p.v: 提索想和你谈谈。

p.k: Tiso would like to talk to you!
p.v: 提索想和你谈谈！

p.k: where are we going?
p.v: 我们要去哪儿？

p.k: ok,
p.v: 好的，

p.k: You want to test your strength huh? go and kill 20 distortion monsters and return to me.
p.v: 你想试试自己的实力吗？去杀 20 个扭曲的怪物再回来找我

p.k: You want to test your strength huh? go and kill 20 zombies and return to me.
p.v: 你想试试自己的实力吗？去杀 20 个僵尸再回来找我。

p.k: You want to test your strength huh? go and kill 15 skeletons and return to me.
p.v: 你想试试自己的实力吗，去杀了 15 个骷髅再回来找我。

p.k: You want to test your strength huh? go and kill 15 spiders and return to me.
p.v: 你想试试自己的实力吗，去杀了 15 个蜘蛛再回来找我。

p.k: You want to test your strength huh? go and kill 10 creepers and return to me.
p.v: 你想试试自己的实力吗，去杀了 10 个苦力怕再回来找我。

p.k: Nice job out there. heres your reward.
p.v: 干得漂亮，这是给你的奖励。

p.k: I'll stay here.
p.v: 我会留在这里。

p.k: I'll move around.
p.v: 我会四处溜达。

p.k: §4Not So Fast...
p.v: §4没那么快...

p.k: §4The Lost can no longer spawn.
p.v: §4失落者无法再生成

p.k: §4The Lost can now spawn.
p.v: §4失落者现在可以生成

p.k: Hello There!
p.v: 你好！

p.k: Hey I actually do have something I need to talk to you about something
p.v: 嘿，我确实有事要跟你谈谈

p.k: Ever since that Daraku guy showed up my head has felt a bit foggy
p.v: 自从那个叫达拉库的家伙出现后，我的脑袋就有点迷糊了

p.k: Besides the fact that hes been terrorizing the overworld hes also been ruining my sense of direction.
p.v: 除了在整个世界制造恐怖之外，他还破坏了我的方向感。

p.k: If you could find some way to get rid of him or atleast nullify him that would be a great help.
p.v: 如果你们能找到某种方法除掉他，或者至少让它失效，那将会是很大的帮助。

p.k: Of course you would probably need another soul gem to do that.
p.v: 当然，你可能需要另一块灵魂宝石才能做到这一点。

p.k: Good luck out there
p.v: 祝你在外面好运

p.k: That daraku guy needs to be taken care of I suggest crafting something else from his soul gem to stop him because I dont think a sigil of purity would work on him.
p.v: 我建议用他的灵魂宝石制作其他东西来阻止他，因为我不认为纯净印记对他有用。

p.k: Hey there!
p.v: 嗨，你们好！

p.k: I'm guessing you took care of daraku, my head feels a lot clearer now.
p.v: 我猜你已经解决了达拉库，我现在感觉头脑清醒多了。

p.k: Thank you for that, I really cant thank you enough for everything you've done.
p.v: 谢谢你，你所做的一切让我感激不尽。

p.k: I know im asking a lot of you. But I do have another request if thats ok with you.
p.v: 我知道我的要求很过分。但如果你同意的话，我还有一个请求。

p.k: Now that my heads clear im remembering some things from my time as a monster I couldnt remember before.
p.v: 现在我的头脑清醒了，我想起了一些以前想不起来的事情。

p.k: I remember walking through a snow biome late at night and I felt a familiar presence.
p.v: 我记得在深夜走过一个雪地生物群落时，我感觉到了一种熟悉的气息。

p.k: I saw a large creature I've never seen before deep in the blizzard.
p.v: 我在风雪深处看到了一个我从未见过的大型生物。

p.k: Though... it felt, strangely familiar?
p.v: 虽然......感觉，非常熟悉？

p.k: It's been bothering me for a while now, so I would really appreciate it if you went and checked out the nearby snow biomes for that thing.
p.v: 这个问题困扰我很久了，如果你能去附近的雪地生物群落看看，我会非常感激。

p.k: Im sorry if im asking too much.
p.v: 如果我的要求太过分，请原谅。

p.k: Good luck out there! and thank you.
p.v: 祝你好运！谢谢。

p.k: If you want to find that creature I suggest searching snowy biomes.
p.v: 如果你想找到这种生物，我建议你搜索雪地生物群落。

p.k: Hey! Have you dealt with that creature yet?
p.v: 嘿，你对付过那个怪物吗？

p.k: Oh. It retreated you say?
p.v: 哦 你说它跑路了？

p.k: Hmm. I think I know where it might have gone
p.v: 嗯。我想我知道它可能去哪儿了

p.k: Theres this old wretched place I used to go when I was a monster
p.v: 我还是怪物时常去的那个破地方

p.k: It was called the resting grounds.
p.v: 它被称为安息之地。

p.k: All the scouts come from that realm. And I've seen many entities go there to heal their wounds. Including this Glykaris fellow.
p.v: 所有的侦查者都来自那个领域。我见过很多实体去那里疗伤。包括这个叫格莱卡利斯的家伙

p.k: If you really want to go there I can send you there. You will need to find a ire shrine in order to exit and Its extremely risky.
p.v: 如果你真的想去那里，我可以送你去。您需要找到一个愤怒神庙才能离开，而且风险极大。

p.k: If you choose to go there i do wish you luck...
p.v: 如果你选择去那里，我祝你好运...

p.k: Hey! im guessing you dealt with glykaris?
p.v: 嘿！我猜你处理了格莱卡利斯吧？

p.k: Well by now im sure your not suprised to hear that killing it wont keep it down forever.
p.v: 好了，现在我相信你不会感到惊讶了，杀了它并不能永远压制住它。

p.k: But there may be a way to fix this.
p.v: 但也许有办法解决这个问题。

p.k: Perhaps that monster isnt what it seems. maybe it could be cured! just like me.
p.v: 也许那个怪物并不像它看起来的那样，也许它可以被治愈！就像我一样。

p.k: Maybe if you crafted some kind of soul capsule you could cure him and transport him out of the resting grounds.
p.v: 如果你能制作出某种灵魂胶囊，也许就能治好他，并把他送出休安息之地。

p.k: Though im sure it would be difficult to obtain.
p.v: 虽然我相信这很难获得。

p.k: But I think its worth it so bring peace to another lost soul!
p.v: 但我认为，为了给另一个迷失的灵魂带来安宁，这样做是值得的！

p.k: Good luck out there!
p.v: 祝你好运！

p.k: Glykaris may be weak enough to be cured now! I wonder who that viscious beast truly is.
p.v: 格莱卡利斯现在可能已经虚弱到可以净化的地步了！我想知道那个可怕的野兽到底是谁。

p.k: Im guessing you've captured glykaris now?
p.v: 我猜你现在已经抓住了格莱卡利斯？

p.k: Great! I never doubted you for a moment.
p.v: 好极了，我从未怀疑过你。

p.k: Thank you for saving my brother I cant thank you enough.
p.v: 谢谢你们救了我弟弟，我对你们感激不尽。

p.k: Im sure he will have something for you to do if you ever get bored.
p.v: 如果你觉得无聊，他肯定会给你找点事做。

p.k: In the meantime I actually have anything else for you to do! but if anything comes up you will be the first to know!
p.v: 在此期间，我其实还有其他事情要你去做！但如果有什么事情发生，你会第一时间知道的！

p.k: §4The Overseer can no longer spawn.
p.v: §4监视者无法再生成

p.k: §4The Overseer can now spawn.
p.v: §4监视者现在可以生成

p.k: Oh- Really?! Right infront of me?!
p.v: 真的吗？就在我面前？

p.k: ???:You're pretty heartless arnt you?
p.v: ？？？：你还真是没心没肺啊？

p.k: §dThe Scoutlet seems calm at the moment...
p.v: §d侦查者目前似乎很平静...

p.k: §4The Scoutlet seems alarmed about something...
p.v: §4侦察者似乎对某个东西发出警报...

p.k: Hello? Is someone there?
p.v: 喂，有人在吗？

p.k: I thought I was the only one out here.
p.v: 我还以为这里只有我一个人呢。

p.k: Come outside.
p.v: 到外面来。

p.k: Dont worry Im friendly.
p.v: 别担心，我很友好的。

p.k: Hello? I need help.
p.v: 你好？我需要帮助

p.k: I have supplies, follow me!
p.v: 我有补给，跟我来！

p.k: We should stick together its a harsh world out there.
p.v: 我们应该团结在一起，外面的世界很残酷的。

p.k: Please help me...
p.v: 请帮帮我...

p.k: Ok I'll stay here
p.v: 好的，我会留在这里。

p.k: Ok I'll move around again.
p.v: 好吧，我会再四处转转。

p.k: §4Tainted Distant Ones can no longer spawn.
p.v: §4受污染的遥远之物不再生成。

p.k: §4Tainted Distant Ones can now spawn.
p.v: §4受污染的遥远之物现在可以生成。

p.k: Heya
p.v: 嘿

p.k: I dont get why your all nice to me suddenly.
p.v: 我不明白你为什么突然对我这么好。

p.k: Well you dont look like your about to die so thats good.
p.v: 你看起来不像要死的样子，所以很好。

p.k: Jesus did someone throw a block of tnt at you?
p.v: 天哪，是不是有人朝你扔了块TNT？

p.k: The overworld is nice. I suppose destroying it would be a shame.
p.v: 这个主世界很不错。我想，毁掉它未免太可惜了。

p.k: How are you?
p.v: 你好吗？

p.k: I hope your doing alright. Thats something i never expected to say.
p.v: 希望你一切都好。这是我没想到会说的话。

p.k: Its pretty nice out today.
p.v: 今天天气不错

p.k: You visited the distortion since the whole unpowering incident? It feels a bit off.
p.v: 你去过失力事件后的扭曲之地吗？感觉有点不对劲。

p.k: I hope my disciples are holding up well without me.
p.v: 我希望我的教徒们在没有我的情况下也能保持良好的状态。

p.k: Distortis has come after me a few times now that im not as strong as him. I suppose he only served be because I would've killed him otherwise.
p.v: 扭曲者已经来找过我几次了，但是现在我没有他那么强壮。我想他之前之所以这么做，是因为否则我会杀了他。

p.k: Even now im still a void entity. I wonder what it was like to be human.
p.v: 即使现在，我仍然是一个虚空实体。我想知道做人是什么感觉。

p.k: I find this world quite fascinating.
p.v: 我觉得这个世界非常迷人。

p.k: I find myself more and more tired every day.
p.v: 我发现自己一天比一天累。

p.k: Your alright.
p.v: 你没事吧。

p.k: Huh? Sorry I dozed off.
p.v: 啊？对不起，我打瞌睡了。

p.k: You ok?
p.v: 你还好吧？

p.k: Hey there.
p.v: 嘿，你们好

p.k: hm?
p.v: 嗯？

p.k: What do YOU want.
p.v: 你想要什么。

p.k: I dont want to talk to you.
p.v: 我不想和你说话。

p.k: You look healthy. just been running from all your battles huh?
p.v: 你看起来很健康，只是一直在逃避战斗吧？

p.k: You look pretty beat up. Good I hope it hurts.
p.v: 你看起来伤得不轻。很好，我希望会疼

p.k: I was this close to taking over the overworld and you just had to play hero.
p.v: 我就差那么一点就能占领整个世界了，而你却只能充当英雄。

p.k: Please by all means, leave me alone.
p.v: 无论如何，请让我一个人静一静。

p.k: I was having a good day until you came around.
p.v: 你来之前，我过得很好。

p.k: I used to be able to claw through bedrock. Now I cant even break cobblestone because of you.
p.v: 我曾经可以抓破基岩。现在因为你，我连圆石都打不穿了。

p.k: Go away.
p.v: 走开。

p.k: That Tiso guy seems pretty happy. Lucky him.
p.v: 那个叫提索的家伙看起来很开心，他真幸运。

p.k: Stop talking to me.
p.v: 别跟我说话

p.k: Come to mock a defeated foe? dont bother.
p.v: 来嘲笑战败的敌人？别费心了。

p.k: You know how hard I worked to get that strong? There arnt even enough void entities left that I can consume to get that strong again.
p.v: 你知道我是多么努力才变得如此强大吗？我甚至都没有足够的虚空实体可以让我再次变得如此强大。

p.k: I hope you dig down into lava.
p.v: 我希望你能挖到熔岩。

p.k: Im sick of seeing your face.
p.v: 我不想再看到你的脸了

p.k: Please. Just leave.
p.v: 求你了，离开吧

p.k: If I have to see your face again I'm jumping into lava
p.v: 如果再让我看到你的脸，我就跳进岩浆里去

p.k: How come you just come back when you die. Thats just unfair.
p.v: 为什么你死了就能复活？这太不公平了

p.k: hmm?
p.v: 嗯？

p.k: oh. hello.
p.v: 噢，你好。

p.k: you look healthy.
p.v: 你看起来很健康

p.k: we all get battle scars. its just part of being an adventurer
p.v: 我们都会在战斗中留下伤疤，这只是冒险家的一部分

p.k: thanks for the help earlier.
p.v: 谢谢你刚才的帮助。

p.k: whats up?
p.v: 什么事？

p.k: I was always an expert at slaying monsters. I never expected to become one.
p.v: 我一直是消灭怪物的专家。我从未想过自己会成为怪物。

p.k: Thanks for helping out my brother tiso. He can get too emotional sometimes.
p.v: 谢谢你帮我弟弟提索。他有时太情绪化了

p.k: You must be pretty strong if you took out all these eldritch entities huh?
p.v: 如果你干掉了所有这些长生实体，你一定很强大，是吧？

p.k: Im tired.
p.v: 我累了

p.k: I love the snow I've always found it calming.
p.v: 我喜欢雪，总觉得它能让人平静。

p.k: I hope tiso's doing alright without his sister. He always seemed so attached to her.
p.v: 我希望提索在没有姐姐的日子里一切都好。他看起来总是那么依恋她。

p.k: To think our whole family was damned to this fate. it cant be a coincidence right?
p.v: 想想我们全家人都遭此厄运，这不会是巧合吧？

p.k: who's that frail little lizard whos been scampering around? i dont recognize him from anywhere.
p.v: 那个到处乱窜的虚弱的小蜥蜴是谁？我在哪儿都认不出他来。

p.k: I wonder what happened to everyone else.
p.v: 我想知道其他人怎么样了。

p.k: Its a nice day today.
p.v: 今天天气不错。

p.k: huh?
p.v: 啊？

p.k: Hey.
p.v: 嘿。

p.k: What are you up to today?
p.v: 你今天有什么打算？

p.k: Hi there!
p.v: 你好！

p.k: How are you?
p.v: 你还好吗？

p.k: You dont look too beat up today, thats good!
p.v: 你今天看起来没受什么伤，这很好！

p.k: oh dear. you might want to patch yourself up.
p.v: 哦，天哪，你可能得给自己包扎一下了。

p.k: Sorry about the whole rampaging thing before I wasnt myself.
p.v: 对不起，我之前太冲动了。

p.k: Watcha up too?
p.v: 你还好吗？

p.k: Hey! do you need something?
p.v: 嘿！你需要什么东西吗？

p.k: I hope your having a nice day.
p.v: 希望你今天过得愉快

p.k: hi friend!
p.v: 嗨，朋友！

p.k: I saw a tall pale figure staring at me the other night. do you know who that is?
p.v: 有天晚上，我看到一个高大的苍白身影盯着我，你知道那是谁吗？

p.k: Do you have any more of those sweet berry things? I love them.
p.v: 你还有那些甜浆果吗？我很喜欢

p.k: I love being myself again but I do kinda miss being able to fell trees with my bare hands.
p.v: 我喜欢做回自己，但我确实有点怀念能徒手砍树的日子。

p.k: Things seem a bit calmer now. I guess I was causing a bit of a disruption wasnt I?
p.v: 现在事情似乎平静了一些。我想我造成出了一些混乱，对吗？

p.k: Try not to get mauled out there. the world needs you.
p.v: 尽量别在那边受伤。世界需要你。

p.k: I feel a bit tired today.
p.v: 我今天感觉有点累。

p.k: You must be pretty skilled if you were able to get this far. good job!
p.v: 如果你能做到这一步，你一定很做事很熟练！干得漂亮！

p.k: The clouds are pretty today.
p.v: 今天的云真漂亮。

p.k: how come whenever you seem to perish you always show up again? Maybe im just delusional.
p.v: 为什么每当你似乎消失的时候，你总是会再次出现？也许我只是在幻想而已。

p.k: Any plans today?
p.v: 今天有什么计划吗？

p.k: A strange chill goes down your spine...
p.v: 一股莫名的寒意袭上心头

p.k: §l§4Better luck next time dad.
p.v: §l§4祝你下次好运，爸爸。

p.k: §l§4Still testing the mod are we?
p.v: §l§4我们还在测试模组吗？

p.k: §l§4Given who you are im guessing you weren't scared in the slightest?
p.v: §l§4鉴于你的身份 我猜你丝毫不害怕？

p.k: §l§4Oh its a wrap! But not for me.
p.v: §l§4哦，这是一次穿越！但对我来说不是。

p.k: §l§4You arnt going to show this death are you?
p.v: §l§4你不会让人看到你这次死亡吧？

p.k: §l§4Better luck next time Jamsteo...
p.v: §l§4祝你下次好运，Jamsteo...

p.k: §l§4You really put the moron in your name huh?
p.v: §l§4你真的把 "白痴 "写进了自己的名字？

p.k: §l§4Mmmm... Yummy hotdog...
p.v: §l§4嗯... 美味的热狗...

p.k: §l§4Are you really that afraid of me Ezure?
p.v: §l§4你真的那么怕我吗，Ezure？

p.k: §l§4I guess thats why they call you Joker huh?
p.v: §l§4我想这就是他们叫你小丑的原因吧？

p.k: §l§4Back to the void with you idiot.
p.v: §l§4和你这个白痴一起回到虚空中去吧

p.k: §l§4Try NOT to die next time Khyle...
p.v: §l§4下次别再死了，Khyle...

p.k: Well... That was unpleasant.
p.v: 嗯... 真不愉快

p.k: I dont think you have the right item for that.
p.v: 我认为你没有合适的物品。

p.k: Huh?!
p.v: 啊？

p.k: Daraku would like to talk to you...
p.v: 达拉库想和你谈谈...

p.k: Life in the abyss is coming out from hiding!
p.v: 深渊中的生命正从藏身处走出来！

p.k: A photo of two siblings. one with a familiar pair of horns. (Kinda weird to keep somebody elses family photo in your home dontcha think?)
p.v: 两兄妹的合影，其中一人有一对熟悉的角。(在家里放别人的全家福有点奇怪，你觉得呢？）

p.k: (Can be Infused with hemostone bricks at an altar of ire to make a gore core.)
p.v: (可在愤怒祭坛上注入血红石砖，制成血肉核心）。

p.v: 用于切换失落者的生成。

p.v: 使用远古之心右键单击时，会重新生成凡塔布莱克收割者。

p.v: 用于切换监视者的生成。

p.v: 来自虚空最深处的虚空物质块。它可能已有数万亿年的历史。

p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的铁锭。

p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的金锭。

p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的钻石。

p.k: A shard of amethyst infused with ire magic.
p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的紫水晶。

p.k: A emerald infused with ire magic.
p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的绿宝石。

p.k: A netherite infused with ire magic.
p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的下界合金。

p.k: A scrap of lapis infused with ire magic.
p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的青金石碎片。

p.k: A pile of redstone infused with ire magic.
p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的红石。

p.k: A copper ingot infused with ire magic.
p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的铜锭。

p.k: A shard of nether quartz infused with ire magic.
p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的地狱石英。

p.v: 注入了愤怒魔法的煤。
